name: KC3CDU
0:
”Alexa, open timothy's clear node”
”Alexa, ask timothy's clear node for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start timothy's clear node”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: timothy's clear node
des:
This is a live audio feed from my personal Clearnode. 
 This means you will hear all of my ham radio traffic including my CW ID, local time and weather, and when I'm listening and or transmitting. 
 Ham radio is very much public and for the longest time, I have wanted to set my node up in the store to be available for streaming on every Alexa enabled device. 
 Because this is live and nothing is prerecorded, you will have times when everything is silent. However, every 15 minutes you will hear my local weather and time of the day or night. This may also prompt my CW id to go off so, if you are concerned that the stream isn't working, I can assure you that it is. If you aren't sure, listen for 15 or so minutes and you will hear that indeed it is. Keep in mind that there's about a 2 minute delay from when things are happening live on my end to when you hear it on your device. This is because of the way streams happen online and will in no way effect your listening experience. 
 So sit back with a cup of tea and enjoy my ham radio activity. 
 To learn more about me, check out 
 timothyclarkmusic.wordpress.com 
 Made with Love in Jesus name.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
